trends: There has been one other sighting in Oscoda
There were no other sightings in Oscoda on or around August 2nd 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsWife and I observed 3 solid red lights in sky in cloud formation. Lights were stationary for appx 2-3 minutes. Lights began to ascend to cloud line then vanished. 3rd light vanished half way up cloud line. Planes visable in area. Clear night aside from cloud formation. No associated events.
